rules_text:
When Warlock of Dark Power dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life.
Blight {B} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your upkeep, Warlock of Demonic Darkness deals 2 damage to you.
